meanings.definition: To hit someone on the head.
meanings.sent1: He accidentally bonced his friend with the ball during the game.
meanings.sent2: The comedian joked that he would bonce his friend if he didn't stop laughing.

meanings.sent5: The teacher had to bonce the ruler on the desk to get the students' attention.
